column4: i know this is a stupid question, but if i wanted to add an icon to home and my mounted hfs+ partition, how would i go about doing that?
right click on desktop, make launcher, insert command like "nautilus /path/to/directory"
but if you put your hfs+ in fstab it will show up in the computer places (in nautilus)
aaah yep, i did add the hfs part to fstab and its showing up in computer places .. thatnks for that
